name: Cat blob game
description:
Cat blob mini game prototype demo. 

Just 2 quest to complete. Carrots are a good source of vitamins and minerals.

Use mouse to move.

Menu toggle:

M - exit menu

B - bottom menu

Q - quest menu 

You can't exit in Webgl version.

I'd appreciate any feedback :)

Music: opengameart.org/content/town-theme-rpg
